title: Platinum 1 Support main LFT
body:
**Have all communication software & available 95% of the time.
Looking for a Plat 3+ Ranked 5s team.**

Champion Pool (in order): Janna, Nami, Thresh, Braum, Leona, Alistar, Blitz, Morgana, Lulu.
Rank: Platinum 1.
Role: Support

**IGN: The Paragon**

*Can also bring a Master Tier ADC with me, providing he likes the team.
*

**Send me an add in-game as I won't check this too often after today**

replies.body:
Hey would be interested in having you on our team here is a link if you're interested...

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/MIAPlElt-looking-for-goldplat-players-from-season-4-and-willing-to-start-a-semi-serious-ranked-team
